EmailTemplate.description: Email notice to object owner for Live Registration Notice
EmailTemplate.name: Live Prospect Registration Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: New Registration Notice! Your Path to Active Planning at Adaptive Live
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Adaptive Live Prospect Registration Notice
{!CampaignMember.FirstName} {!CampaignMember.LastName} from {!CampaignMember.CompanyOrAccount} has registered for Your Path to Active Planning.
Take the opportunity to reach out and make a connection. Thank him/her for registering and provide your contact details so you can connect on site and provide any assistance.
{!CampaignMember.Link}
Thank You Sonia Torres storres@adaptiveinsights.com 650-422-7335
